wikipedia_page.main: George Pepall (29 February 1876 – 8 January 1953) was an English cricketer. He played 14 matches of first-class cricket for Gloucestershire between 1896 and 1904. His best figures were 5 for 63 against Yorkshire in 1896.

response: *George Pepall (1876–1953), county cricketer, was born in the town.
